Package dev.blu.model.core

Class FileEncryptAndSplit

java.lang.Object
dev.blu.model.core.FileEncryptAndSplit
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileAction
public class FileEncryptAndSplit
extends java.lang.Object
implements FileAction
A composite FileAction that uses FileEncryptor and FileSplitterByMaxSize to perform an encrypted division of a File
Author:
blubo
